thread.section_title: News24, South Africa's premier news source, provides breaking news on national, world, Africa, sport, entertainment, technology & more.
thread.title: Afghan volleyball match attacked

author: news24.com
title: Afghan volleyball match attacked
text:
Kabul - At least nine civilians were killed on Sunday and 33 wounded in an attack at a volleyball match in Afghanistan's southeastern Paktika province, the government said.
"Initial information shows nine people, all of them civilians, have been killed," said interior ministry spokesperson Sediq Sediqqi.
The police chief of Paktika province, Zrawar Zahid, put the death toll at 10, with 33 injured including children.
